definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cover (NH id., esp. Pi.; Aram. [[חֲפָא]], h.po0 (esp. Pa.); Ar. xafiya be hidden, xafay hide)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[חָפוּ]] 2Sa 15:30 + 3 t.; Pt. [[חָפוּי]] 2Sa 15:30; cstr. [[חֲפוּי]] Es 6:12; —cover the head ([[ראׁשׁ]]), in token of grief 2Sa 15:30, Je 14:3, Je 14:4; pt. agrees with ´[[ר]] 2Sa 15:30; [[חֲפוּי ראׁשׁ]] (‖[[אָבֵל ]]) Es 6:12; in token of sentence of death Es 7:8.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[נֶחְפָּה]] Ps 68:13 (´[[כנפי יונה נ]]), c. [[בְּ]] of material.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. (late) [[חִפָּה]] 2 Ch 2Ch 3:8, 2Ch 3:9; Impf. [[וַיְחַף]] 2Ch 3:7; sf. [[וַיְחַפֵּהוּ]] 2Ch 3:5, 2Ch 3:8; overlay sq. 2 acc. (one of material) 2Ch 3:5, 2Ch 3:5, 2Ch 3:7, 2Ch 3:8, 2Ch 3:9.
